title: RPG加血问题
author: asen
txt_content: 怎么创建一个RPGitem搞得装备，穿上能加血呢？

replies.author: a1647321154
replies.txt_content:
asen 发表于 2015-2-12 14:02
+x Health前面的+x照抄？
x代表数字

replies.author: a1647321154
replies.txt_content: 装个Lore Attributes Revival,然后输入/rpgitem [物品] description add +x Health x代表数字

replies.author: a1647321154
replies.txt_content: 装个Lore Attributes Revival,然后输入/rpgitem [物品] description add +x Health x代表数字

replies.author: asen
replies.txt_content:
a1647321154 发表于 2015-2-12 13:59
装个Lore Attributes Revival,然后输入/rpgitem [物品] description add +x Health x代表数字
+x Health前面的+x照抄？
